local_intent: Perceive the T-block, approach it, and align the end-effector for pushing; verify arrival at the block.
assumptions: Block pose remains valid during approach
Collision-free path exists to the approach pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach/align phase of the global plan: detect the block, execute ApproachAndAlign with the specified tolerance and timeout, then verify proximity before subsequent yaw setting and pushing.
